Trade/Device Name(s): Clever Chek Health Care System Software
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Clever Chek blood glucose plus blood pressure monitors
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Clever Chek Health Care System Software for data management of test results from Clever Chek glucose and blood pressure monitors
Indications for Use Summary: Intended as an optional software accessory to transfer, review, analyze, and evaluate historical test results from Clever Chek meters to support health management in home and clinical settings
